title: i'am unable to launch lolclient please help
body:
**hello , i can't start lol launcher it just pop up fast and vanish **

>>>click to open on icone launcher >>> then it apears 3 secs >>> vanish and some league of legends prossesus still running in task manager   

**this issue came after 1 day when i installed alpha client now both lunchers won't work please i need help 
i tried re-installing , removed avira , run as admin ,redownload launcher 
i get this errors in lolpatcherUx log**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


000000.003|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Reader::RadsMain::Initialize: RADS library initializing with specified working directory "D:\AprÃ©s formatage\icon\pack 3D .ico\Adobe\league of legends\RADS\projects\lol_patcher\releases\0.0.0.72\deploy".

000000.003|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Reader::RuntimeEnvironment::Create: Creating RADS runtime environment: RADS root directory = "D:/AprÃ©s formatage/icon/pack 3D .ico/Adobe/league of legends/RADS"

000000.003|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Reader::ReleaseManifest::LoadInternal: ("D:/AprÃ©s formatage/icon/pack 3D .ico/Adobe/league of legends/RADS/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.72/releasemanifest")

000000.003|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Reader::ReleaseManifest::LoadInternal: Failed to open "D:/AprÃ©s formatage/icon/pack 3D .ico/Adobe/league of legends/RADS/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.72/releasemanifest".

000000.003|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Reader::`anonymous-namespace'::CreateListing: Failure to load project manifest "D:/AprÃ©s formatage/icon/pack 3D .ico/Adobe/league of legends/RADS/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.72/releasemanifest".

000000.003|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Reader::RuntimeEnvironment::CollectProjects: Failed to create project listing at D:/AprÃ©s formatage/icon/pack 3D .ico/Adobe/league of legends/RADS/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.72.

000000.003|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Reader::RuntimeEnvironment::Create: RADS runtime environment creation failed because it was unable to collect the projects.

000000.003|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Reader::RadsMain::Initialize: RADS library initialization failed to create the runtime environment.

000000.003|  ERROR| Failed to initialize Rads library.

000000.003|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Reader::SignalSoftRepair: Unable to write soft repair file: D:/AprÃ©s formatage/icon/pack 3D .ico/Adobe/league of legends/RADS/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.72/SOFT_REPAIR


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

help please !

replies.body: Some setting or program may be blocking the patcher from launching, which is why nothing appears when selecting the lol icon.  I suggest using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix that up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
you where right thank you , i acctually moved lol from D:/ to C:/  then i noticed that there was a problem with the  D:/ thanks for guiding me to solution have a good day ^^

I had a same problem.  I did not like that had to be moved to the C drive, but it is solved my problem.
Thanks at all :)
